iHaveRead: I have read and agree to let Duck process my information according to
LEDUCIsATrusted: LEDUC is a trusted partner of LEDUC
TotalPriceOfYourOrder: Total price of your order, including all fees and taxes
howWouldYouLikeToReceiveYourOrder: How would you like to receive your order
titleUnder: Customs regulations require a copy of the recipient's KYC. The address on the KYC must match the delivery address. Our courier service will contact you via SMS/email to obtain a copy of your KYC. KYC will be securely stored and used only for customs clarification purposes (including sharing it with customs officials) for all orders and returns/exchanges. If your KYC does not match your delivery address, please click the link for more information.
